sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using inverse matrices
message_1:
Find the values of x, y and z in the system of equations below.

2x + 3y - 4z = 10 

5x - 6y + z = -3 

-4x + 3y - 2z = 4

And solve the equations using inverse matrices.
message_2:
To solve the system of equations using inverse matrices, we first need to represent the given system of equations in matrix form AX = B, where A is the matrix of coefficients, X is the column matrix of variables (x, y, z), and B is the column matrix of constants.

The given system of equations can be represented as:

A = |  2  3 -4 |
    |  5 -6  1 |
    | -4  3 -2 |

X = | x |
    | y |
    | z |

B = | 10  |
    | -3  |
    |  4  |

Now, we need to find the inverse of matrix A, denoted as A^(-1). To do this, we first find the determinant of A:

det(A) = 2((-6)(-2) - (1)(3)) - 3((5)(-2) - (1)(-4)) - 4((5)(3) - (-6)(-4))
       = 2(12 - 3) - 3(-10 - 4) - 4(15 - 24)
       = 2(9) + 3(14) + 4(-9)
       = 18 + 42 - 36
       = 24

Since the determinant is non-zero, the inverse of A exists. Now, we find the adjugate of A and divide each element by the determinant to get A^(-1).

adj(A) = | (-6)(-2) - (1)(3)   (5)(-2) - (1)(-4)   (5)(3) - (-6)(-4) |
         | (3)(-2) - (-4)(3)   (2)(-2) - (-4)(-4)   (2)(3) - (3)(-4) |
         | (3)(1) - (-6)(5)    (2)(1) - (5)(-6)    (2)(-6) - (5)(3) |

adj(A) = |  9   6  -3 |
         |  6  -4   6 |
         | 27  28 -42 |

A^(-1) = (1/det(A)) * adj(A)

A^(-1) = (1/24) * |  9   6  -3 |
                 |  6  -4   6 |
                 | 27  28 -42 |

Now, we can find the solution to the system of equations by multiplying A^(-1) with B:

X = A^(-1) * B

X = (1/24) * |  9   6  -3 | * | 10  |
             |  6  -4   6 |   | -3  |
             | 27  28 -42 |   |  4  |

X = (1/24) * |  9(10) + 6(-3) - 3(4)  |
             |  6(10) - 4(-3) + 6(4)  |
             | 27(10) + 28(-3) - 42(4)|

X = (1/24) * |  90 - 18 - 12 |
             |  60 + 12 + 24  |
             | 270 - 84 - 168 |

X = (1/24) * | 60 |
             | 96 |
             | 18 |

X = | 60/24 |
    | 96/24 |
    | 18/24 |

X = |  5/2  |
    |  4    |
    |  3/4  |

So, the solution to the system of equations is x = 5/2, y = 4, and z = 3/4.
